text: geudaega geudeul-ui indoleul chaeg-imjyeoya haneun geos-i anila. geuleona hananimkkeseoneun wonhasineun jaleul indohasinola. geudaedeul-i jaesan-eulosseo huisahandamyeon geugeos-eun geudaedeul jasin-eul wihan geos-ila. geudaedeul-i huisahaneun geos-eun ojig hananim-ui eolgul-eul ganguhagi wiham-ila. geudaedeul-i jaesan-eulosseo huisahandamyeon geubunkkeseo geudaedeul-ege namgim-eobs-i bosanghaejusil geos-imyeo geudaedeul-eun budanghi daeubadji anh-eul geos-ila
